Hosting Features

Every hosting account we sell will include these base features. We don't oversell, throttle or change features. Whether you have a shared, reseller or virtual private server account you'll get the same fast storage and bandwidth as well as industry leading support.

SSD Storage

All plans are hosted on industry leading fail-safe, super speed SSD storage. All storage is setup in RAID 10 and is at least 5x faster than conventional hard drives.

24/7 Support

Our experienced support team is available 24/7 to assist with any issues that may arise.

99.9% uptime

All services had the same 99.9% uptime guarantee so you know everything will be available rain or shine

Blazing fast speeds

Our super fast SSDs and high speed bandwidth combine to make your website or project the fastest it can possibly be

Free

SSL Certificates

Never worry about having to setup your sites security because every hosting account includes unlimted SSL certificates for all domains and subdomains.

Free

Migration

Already have your site up and running at another host? Provide your info at setup and we'll make sure everything gets migrated and running. You don't have to lift a finger

Free

Daily backups

Never be afraid of losing your data again. We provide free, daily backups of all files so you don't have to stress about your data ever again.

automated software installation

All shared hosting accounts include a suite of free one-click installable software
